伸冤.definition: to right wrongs; to redress an injustice

伸展臺.definition: runway (for a fashion show etc); catwalk

伸張.definition: to uphold (e.g. justice or virtue); to promote

伸懶腰.definition: to stretch oneself (on waking or when tired etc)

伸手.definition: to reach out with one's hand; to hold out a hand; (fig.) to beg; to get involved; to meddle

伸手不見五指.pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3

伸港.definition: Shengang or Shenkang Township in Changhua County 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 Xian4], Taiwan

伸港鄉.definition: Shengang or Shenkang Township in Changhua County 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 Xian4], Taiwan

伸縮.definition: to lengthen and shorten; flexible; adjustable; retractable; extensible; telescoping (collapsible)

伸開.definition: to stretch out (one's arms or legs etc)
